nodes.text: Blue bantha buttermilk biscuits were a type of foodstuff made with buttermilk from banthas. When the Weequay pirate Hondo Ohnaka was in possession of the light freighter Millennium Falcon, he found that the starship's refrigerator unit contained blue bantha buttermilk biscuits, blue Bespin breakfast bars, and blue puff cubes, which led him to wonder if all the edible items were blue.
Blue bantha buttermilk biscuits first appeared in the canon junior novel Pirate's Price, which was written by Lou Anders and published in 2019.
